name: Event
description:
The Event message is sent when event is triggered. It includes the Event ID and a
      sequence number to allow the client to keep track of event processing.

MessageID.comment: A two byte field to hold the message ID of a message

EventID.comment: Unique identifier of the enclosed event

SequenceNumber.comment: Sequential count of the number of times this event has been issued

ReportMessage.comment: The JAUS Report message including the message header

payloadMessageId.comment: message id of the payload message

payload.comment: The JAUS Report message including the message header
